requiredEquipmentExplanation: The video title, description, and tags all emphasize that this workout is designed for stretching and core exercises without the need for any equipment. The phrase 'no equipment' is explicitly mentioned in both the title and workout details in the description, clearly indicating that the exercises are intended to be performed using only body weight. Additionally, there are no mentions or suggestions of using any specific equipment in the comments, which focus instead on personal experiences and the benefits of the workout. Overall, the metadata strongly supports the classification that this workout is bodyweight only, with no additional equipment required.
